Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SuperSmoothMover
        • Animator
          • Plant
  • public abstract class Plant
extends Animator
    Superclass Plant. Gives similar functionality and attributes of a Plant for subclasses to use.
    Version:
    April 12, 2022
    Author:
    Nathan and Max

    • Constructor Detail

      • Plant

        public Plant()
        Constructor for plant Default sets health to 200 and creates an hp bar initializes the plant as not getting eaten

    • Method Detail

      • addedToWorld

        public void addedToWorld​(greenfoot.World w)
        When the polants are added to the world, their hp bar is added to the world at that location and updates
        Overrides:
        addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor

      • act

        public void act()
        Plants are used as food for Herbivores, go to method details for more specifications. Act - Plants will continously:
        1. Update plant hp
        2. Check if they are being eaten
        3. Check if they are fully eaten
        Overrides:
        act in class Animator

      • deathCheck

        public abstract void deathCheck()
        This method checks if the plant has no more health and removes itself.

      • eatPlant

        public double eatPlant()
        This method determines how much damage is being taken when being eaten and returns the amount of health the herbivore regenerates.

        Note: Plant will give a seed based on the percent of health they lose to the herbivore. Cherry will give three seeds if eaten from full health.

      • eatPlant

        public double eatPlant​(double attack)
        This method is used to override the eatPlant() without parameters when the Herbivore is attacking it.

      • growing

        public void growing()
        This healing method is called when the plant is not being eaten.
        • Plant health will never go over a certain amount of health after being eaten.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns the health of plant.

      • giveHealth

        public int giveHealth()
        Returns the health given by the plant.

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Returns max health of plant

      • getToughness

        public double getToughness()
        Return the toughness of the plant.

      • isToxic

        public boolean isToxic()
        Returns whether the plant is toxic or not.

      • wantsCarry

        public boolean wantsCarry()
        Returns whether the plant wants animals to eat it to carry seeds or not.

      • setEating

        public void setEating​(boolean a)
        Setter method for if the plant is being eaten or not. Use this method in the herbivore class.
